rukus.text: tum sub ka maboodh sirf Allah ta’ala akela hai aur aaqirath par imaan na rakhne walo ke dil munkir hai aur wo khud takabbur se bhare hoye hai
beshak wa shuba Allah ta’ala har us cheez ko jise wo log chupaate hai aur jise zaaher karte hai baqoobi jaanta hai, wo ghuroor karne walo ke pasand nahi farmaata
un se jab daryaaft kiya jaata hai ke tumhaare parvardigaar ne kya naazil farmaya hai? to jawaab dete hai ke aglo ki kahaaniya hai
osi ka natija hoga ke qayamath ke din ye log apne pure bojh ke saath hee un ke boojh ke bhi hisse daar honge jinhe be ilmi se gumraah karte rahe, dekho to kaisa bura boojh utha rahe hai
